level.text: 5508.1 A Housing Specialist shall not absorb families into the Program unlesshe Director of the HCVP or his or her designee directs or approves thebsorption of the families.

5508.2 When DCHA is absorbing on an ongoing basis, an incoming portable Familys considered to be absorbed to into the Program once DCHA executes the HAPontract on behalf of the Family, versus at the time of voucher issuance.

5508.3 A portable Family may also be absorbed by terminating billingrrangement with the initial PHA. DCHA shall give thirty (30) days’ advanceotice to the initial PHA of the intent to absorb and the effective date of thebsorption of the Family.
